metadata.title: CVE-2022-20132 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description: In lg_probe and related functions of hid-lg.c and other USB HID files,there is a possible out of bounds read due to improper input validation.This could lead to local information disclosure if a malicious USB HIDdevice were plugged in, with no additional execution privileges needed.User interaction is not needed for exploitation.Product: AndroidVersions:Android kernelAndroid ID: A-188677105References: Upstream kernel

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
